overview:
Alan Hodes is an experienced Sales and Marketing Director in Multi-Media, whose experiences include starting the first web-publishing subsidiary of SPG Media Plc: Industry Solutions Online, then subsequently being involved in the acquisition of their primary competitor NRI Ltd. whilst in the midst of the dotcom boom Now the company generates approx. Â£22M/annum. Earlier, Alan, a qualified audio engineer, worked for Island/Polygram records becoming versed with copyright and data management in the digital domain.

His experience of working at the cutting-edge of technology married with his business acumen places him in a good position to bring value to new concepts with strong commercial application.
